##############
3D Version
##############


.. figure:: ../_static/3d_version.png
  :alt: Nebula Generator
  :width: 100%

The 3D version consists of either an :ref:`Eevee<Eevee>` or :ref:`Cycles<Cycles>` set-up depending on your rendering needs.
